channel.title: Alright,
channel.description: Anyone got the REAL 2h hold emote ID? I believe someone has it. Please don't give me the DH one. If you give me the right one, I'll pay you back. Thanks, Luke.

item.title: Alright,
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:6, topic:257630”][quote author=chassy13 link=topic=340106.msg2635686#msg2635686 date=1232494995]

Anyone got the REAL 2h hold emote ID?
I believe someone has it.
Please don’t give me the DH one.
If you give me the right one, I’ll pay you back.
Thanks,
Luke.

Not available on the 317/377 client I believe…unless you are on a 503+

Hes talking about the one where you lean it on your shoulder, the old one.

He doesn’t want the Dharok One, which is the animation of the old one. Pimped, which do you want?
[/quote]
No. dharok one is specifically for the dharok axe, not all 2h.


is what he wants.[/quote] Yes. That one. Does anyone have it?

Read full topic
